name: Harvest Blob Feed from Corpse Pit: Smash to Harvest
Harvest Blob Feed from Slime Pit: Smash to Harvest
Converts a fridge to run off of vehicle power. You can 'e'xamine it afterwards to take it down for mounting
Further modifies a converted fridge to function as a freezer. You can 'e'xamine it afterwards to take it down for mounting
